purpose: A React component that provides a customizable scroll area with styled scrollbars using Radix UI's ScrollArea primitive

variables.name: ScrollArea
variables.purpose: Main scroll area container component that wraps content with custom scrolling behavior
variables.usage: Used as a container for scrollable content with styled scrollbars

variables.name: ScrollBar
variables.purpose: Custom scrollbar component with configurable orientation and styling
variables.usage: Automatically included in ScrollArea but can be used independently

key_points: Wraps Radix UI's ScrollArea primitive components
Provides custom styling for scroll areas and scrollbars
Uses React.forwardRef for proper ref forwarding
Supports both vertical and horizontal scrollbar orientations
Exports two components: ScrollArea and ScrollBar

patterns: Component composition pattern using Radix UI primitives
ForwardRef pattern for proper ref handling
Utility-first CSS approach with conditional classNames
Display name assignment for better debugging experience
issues: ScrollBar is automatically included in ScrollArea without option to disable it
No support for custom scrollbar styling beyond the predefined classes
Missing TypeScript type exports for the components
The ScrollBar component might benefit from being more configurable (size, colors, etc.)
No error boundary or fallback for cases where ScrollArea primitives fail
